mapper.select:
select t.id id, -- 主键 t.per_name perName, -- 权限名 t.path path, -- 权限路径 t.component component, -- 组件路径 t.icon icon, -- 图标 t.per_sort perSort, -- 排序 t.per_type perType, -- 权限类型 例如 0 菜单 1按钮 t.parent_id parentId, -- 上级权限 默认 0 t.status status, -- 状态 0 禁用 1 启用 t.remark remark, -- 描述 t.create_time createTime, -- 创建时间 t.update_time updateTime -- 更新时间 from ums_permission t where 1=1
and t.per_name LIKE '%${p.perName}%'
and t.path LIKE '%${p.path}%'
and t.component LIKE '%${p.component}%'
and t.icon LIKE '%${p.icon}%'
and t.per_sort LIKE '%${p.perSort}%'
and t.per_type LIKE '%${p.perType}%'
and t.parent_id LIKE '%${p.parentId}%'
and t.status LIKE '%${p.status}%'
and t.remark LIKE '%${p.remark}%'
order by t.per_sort asc,t.id asc

SELECT DISTINCT t.id id, t.per_name perName, t.component component, t.path path, t.per_type perType, t.per_sort perSort, t.icon icon, t.status status, t.remark remark, t.parent_id parentId FROM ums_permission t WHERE t.parent_id = #{parentId} order by t.id

SELECT p.path button FROM ums_permission p LEFT JOIN ums_role_per rp ON rp.per_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ro.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ro.id LEFT JOIN ums_user uu on ur.user_id=uu.id WHERE ro.status = 1 and uu.user_account = #{userAccount} and uu.state = 1 and p.status = 1 and p.per_type = 1 order by p.per_sort asc,p.id asc

SELECT t.id id, t.per_name perName, t.component component, t.path path, t.per_type perType, t.icon icon, t.status status, t.remark remark, t.parent_id parentId FROM ums_permission t LEFT JOIN ums_role_per rp ON rp.per_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ro.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ro.id LEFT JOIN ums_user uu on ur.user_id=uu.id WHERE ro.status = 1 and t.status = 1 and t.per_type = 0 and uu.user_account = #{userAccount} and uu.state = 1 and t.parent_id = #{parentId} order by t.per_sort asc,t.id asc
